Header: Contribute to UN report on Higher Education for Sustainable Urban Development
Comments sought on Technical Report on post-2015 indicators
Description: 17 Apr 2015 - At the beginning of the third session of the intergovernmental negotiations on a post-2015 development agenda, held from 23-27 March at UN Headquarters in New York, a technical report was presented by the Chair of the United Nations Statistical Commission (UNSC) on the process to develop indicators for the new agenda.

Header: Latin American and Caribbean civil society capacity building workshop on post-2015 and HLPF
Member States and Stakeholders discuss vision for post-2015
Description: 1 Mar 2015 - The post-2015 negotiating session (17-20 February 2015) held at UN Headquarters in New York focused on the Declaration of the new development agenda.
1 Jan 2015 - UN General Assembly decided that Report of the Open Working Group on SDGs would be main basis for integrating SDGs into the post-2015 agenda.

Header: Stakeholder Preparatory Forum held on 16 January
Description: 1 Jan 2015 - The Major Groups Programme and the UN Non-Governmental Liaison Service are working to ensure participation of major groups in the negotiations.
